name: Just A Dream (itch) (Gibberish Pretzel)
description:
You are a small child trapped in a relentless nightmare. Ever plagued by the monsters spawned out of your imagination you must use the power of fear to escape your dreams. But be warned if you get too scared you'll wake and be forced to repeat the last nightmare. Only by reaching safety at the end will you progress closer to dawn. 

You can play the game in browser or if that doesn't work you can download the game.

We are a team of 2, one doing art and sound the other programming, and made this game for the Brackeys Jam 2022.1. We used Unity,  Piskel and Bosca Ceol to make all the assets for this game.

We would like to thank Brackeys for hosting this fabulous event in which we had lots of fun participating. We would also like to thank Brackeys for the entertaining and high quality content that has helped us in our game dev journeys both with tutorials and motivation.

Enjoy!
